text: geuligo cheongug-e saneun salamdeul-eun jieug-e saneun jadeul-eul buleudeola sillo ulineun junim-ui yagsog-i jinli im-eul al-assnola neohuineun yeogsi neohui junim-ui yagsog-i jinliideonyo lago mul-euni geuleohseubnida lago daedabha myeo joejieun jadeul-ege hananim-ui jeo juga issdaneun geos-eul al-assseubnida la go hadeola
